Scrash Sublime-Text3 On Ubuntu

May 19, 2014

Edit the sublime in /opt/sublime with bless:

 1   
 2     
 3     On 64 bit linux, replace:
 4         85 C0 0F 94 C0 84 C0 88 05 E3 26 4E 00 75 41 48
 5     to:
 6         90 90 90 90 90 84 C0 88 05 E3 26 4E 00 75 41 48
 7     On 32 bit linux, replace:
 8         0F 94 C0 84 C0 A2 68 CE 4F
 9     to:
10         90 90 90 90 90 A2 68 CE 4F
11
sublime-text Scrash Sublime-Text3 On Ubuntu was published on May 19, 2014 Stephen Wang

Meteor初入门
